/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a park in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The park is lush with greenery, with trees and shrubs dotting the landscape. A winding path meanders through the park, inviting visitors to explore its tranquil beauty. A solitary figure can be seen walking on the path, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
